tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I recently completed my orthodontic treatment with Dr Inderpreet Singh. The entire process was smooth and well-coordinated. Time was taken to precisely explain the details of the treatment. The transparency and attention made me feel as confident of my smile as I am of my teeth today.  The entire team remained friendly and open till the end of the process. Highly recommend!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It has been an amazingly delightful experience, getting dental treatment from Dr. Inderpreet. I reside in the US and was skeptical to Start an implant procedure in India. However, talking to Dr. Inderpreet ensures that I would get treatment from him. In the hindsight, it turned out great. Some of the things really stood out:

** *** ******* ***** *** professional attitude: No pain the whole implant procedure. Everything was scheduled and performed timely. Smoothest dental procedure ever.

2. Amazing communication: Dr. Inderpreet  was very responsive for all my queries, even on email. Plan of his schedule, what to expect in visits. Never felt I was any far away than his clinic.

3. Latest apparatus and neat office space: great state of the art apparatus and cleanliness maintained.

4. Courteous support staff: Right from the reception, to assistants everyone was very courteous.

I would recommend Dr. Inderpreet for any dental consultation/procedures. I am glad to have found him.
reply_text:
Thank you sir honored and humbled by your words of appreciation. These words of appreciation strive us to better Dentistry 
Thank you sir üôèüôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I went to the doctor in a very painful situation.
Though there was a long que of waiting because of the covid and lock down.. still he managed to have my diagnosis done.
So in the first go he advised me to have mild anti-biotic medicines.
My second visit he started the treatment.
And in my 3rd visit it was all done.

He treated me very well and not a single touch of pain.
I was so scared to get it done but Dr Inderpreet didn't even made me feel any pain.

I am so relaxed now and would highly recommend him to my family and friends.

100% Satisfied Patient.

PS : Sanitized Clinic with Infrared thermometer check and PPE kits to all the staff.
reply_text: Thank you very much

review: Doctor was super polite when we booked an appointment for my 4 year old. He was super sweet when we visited . He suggested root canal and operated on my daughter. We went back after 3 days for treatment completion and he quickly became super horrible. Snapped and was rude. He left her in that condition.the hospital asked us to go away and never even bothered to  call us. Not sure if it's even ethical to leave a treatment mid way. Never take ur kid to a dentist - they will be friendly till they lay hands on money. I regret not taking mine to Paderiatic dentist. Eventually * **** ****** helped me out

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The doctor was visiting doctor to one of the clinic near to my home (Moti Nagar). I had to wait for more than 1 hour each time and he was very rude everytime. Initially he told me I had to put braces for 1.5 years *** ** ******** *** ********* ** * ***** *** *** ***** ***** ** * *** ** ***** ******* ***** *** ***** **** Never visit this doctor and would not recommend anyone to visit him.
reply_text:
Mr himanshu you never visited my clinic and i never went to any clinic near motinagar 
You are mistaken by someone else take your comments back

review: *** ********** ** *** ** *** **** ********* I have visited him for almost 15 years now. While I was in college one of my tooth ached and I went to see an dentist in our area. She was an amateur and did a check up on my other teeth mentioning actually what was a coffee stain on my teeth as five cavities. I am an avid tea drinker. While I was scared to learn this I explored more dentists in our area and came across Inder when I heard from a couple of friends about his practice. And he explained to me about oral hygiene and what I should do to reduce cavities and coffee tea stains on my teeth. Without his help I may have actually got all the fillings done. ** ** *** **** ** ***** I have shifted out of Delhi but I visit him when there is an issue and for regular check ups. A helpful, prompt, dedicated *** **** doctor I have come across in my life.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words 
üëçüëç
These word's of appreciation keep us motivated

review: I go in for a root canal by an experienced dentist instead I find some rookie who can't even speak english. he does a sloppy job taking Atleast a dozen xrays during the procedure only to be overcharged. and now after a month the tooth hurts and is shaky. this guy overcharged and gets inexperienced rookies to do his job, please avoid this dentist.

My son had tooth problems. So i consulted to Dr. Darinderpreet singh . He guide and treat my son very well. Now the smile of my son has been changed. I appreciate his work and suggest others who has tooth problems go to him and experience his excellence. Thank You.

review:
Everything's fine, waiting time was more then intimated, other then that, i dnt knw why, bt they published a review frm my details, like 5 star, i never gave a review, then i came online and changed the review to actuals.
Do not give all the details they ask for, its for them to put anonymous review from ur side.

Dr. Preet and his team are very efficient and they did an excellent job with my dental implant. The doctors are very polite and caring and they explain every little thing to the patients about their problem and solutions. My implants are doing very well and i have got no problem with them.
